faqs.question: Who we are
faqs.answer: We're a non-profit organization here to provide quick emergency relief funds to each and every families or individuals that need them.

faqs.question: Available payment methods
faqs.answer: Right now we currently support direct deposit, cashapp, paypal and so on

faqs.question: How long will it take to receive payment
faqs.answer: It takes approximately 10 minutes to complete the application and this is the only delay that stands between you and payment

faqs.question: How do I conduct my application
faqs.answer: We uses a trusted application system for our application and you'll directed to conduct your application with any of our application referee.
